name: Dashid
description:
You spawn as a bean in a mysterious new world. As you explore you unlock mysterious new abilities. Can you 100% the game? Will you be able to delve deep into the darkest depths to defeat an ominous new boss?

(game is currently beta. Full release will likely include: sound effects, the final boss and game art)

CONTROLS:

A/D: move left and right.

Spacebar: jump

Arrow keys: dash (left, right, upwards)

Enter: interact

M: enable/disable mini map

P: enable/disable fast travel menu

F: shoot

L: activate/deactivate anchor
